message: Let's be fair, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor to start.
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling more generous than 60/40, how about we try a 55/45 split?
Bob, this is a negotiation. I came down a little, you go up a little.  58/42?
This is going too slowly Alice. Meet me in the middle - 57/43?
Okay Bob, you drive a hard bargain. Let's settle this - 57/43.
